name: Star vs. The Forces of Evil RPG
name_original: Star vs. The Forces of Evil RPG
description:
This is a fan-made role-playing game (a.k.a RPG) adapted from the Disney Channel Tv show "Star vs. the forces of Evil, the game is not finished and its name is not determined, everything in it can be changed and it's not under Disney Enterprises' supervision&permission.

(This software has 0 relationships to Disney Enterprises and companies under its management)

After finishing the demo, please complete the questionaire: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfFgPl5IeKhEDXWQqCnWBZk69C90au5nsiiwqVx...
